definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: Tottenham striker Jermain Defoe, and maybe Nugent, will be a good option to come off the bench if needed.
sentences.chinese: 熱刺前鋒迪福以及紐根特都將會是有實力的替補。

sentences.english: The Count is the gent in the Homburg, on the right of the driver.
sentences.chinese: 計數是根特，在洪堡，在右邊的驅動程序。

sentences.english: He then opened tea rooms inGhent, Blankenberge and Brussels.
sentences.chinese: 後來，在根特，布蘭肯貝赫以及布魯塞爾開了茶室。

sentences.english: Two days after his arrival on Coruscant, Ghent had Ackbar cleared.
sentences.chinese: 根特抵達科洛桑兩天後，就爲阿克巴洗刷了罪名。

sentences.english: So, instead, I checked into a hotel opposite Ghent railway station.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我在根特火車站對面的一家旅館住了下來。

sentences.english: It even looks as though the idea may attract more tourism to Ghent.
sentences.chinese: 看起來，這個觀點甚至會吸引更多遊客光臨根特。

sentences.english: A city which has tackled this issue effectively is Ghent in Belgium.
sentences.chinese: 比利時的根特市有效地解決了這個問題。

sentences.english: Koi carps swim in a pond of a breeding farm near Gent in Belgium on Aug. 17.
sentences.chinese: 錦鯉八月十七日於比利時根特附近的池塘裏悠遊。

definition: Bruges (Dutch Brugge), medieval town in Belgium
Nürnberg or Nuremberg, town in Bavaria, Germany

pinyin: Ma3 si1 te4 li3 he4 te4

definition: Groningen, province and city in the Netherlands
Copenhagen or København, capital of Denmark
Dresden, capital of Saxony 薩克森州|萨克森州[Sa4 ke4 sen1 zhou1], Germany
